Class.ClassComment: CacheEventFilter /** * A filter that can be used to tell if an event should be raised or not. This filter allows for filtering based on the previous value as well as the new updated value. The old value and old metadata are the previous values and the new value and new metadata are the new values even for pre and post events. * @author wburns * @since 7.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Whether or not this event should be raised to the listener it is attached to. * @param key The key for the entry that was changed for the event * @param oldValue The previous value before the event takes place * @param oldMetadata The old value before the event takes place * @param newValue The new value for the entry after the event takes place * @param newMetadata The new metadata for the entry after the event takes place * @param eventType The type of event that is being raised * @return Whether or not to notify the listener */
